text: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ

translation.en.sahih: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: mengapa Al Quran itu diturunkan kepadanya di antara kita?" Sebenarnya mereka ragu-ragu terhadap Al Quran-Ku, dan sebenarnya mereka belum merasakan azab-Ku.
